imageurl.title: Dashboard
imageurl.description: Main control panel displaying store overview, recent orders, sales statistics, and quick access to key e-commerce features.

imageurl.title: Product Profile
imageurl.description: Detailed product view showing product images, price, description, ratings, and availability similar to Amazon product pages.

imageurl.title: Comment Section
imageurl.description: Customer review and comment section where users can share feedback, ratings, and experiences for purchased products.

imageurl.title: Shipping Address
imageurl.description: Address management screen allowing users to add, edit, and select delivery addresses for order shipment.

imageurl.title: Order Summary
imageurl.description: Final order review page showing selected products, quantities, delivery address, and total cost before payment.

imageurl.title: Payment Screen
imageurl.description: Secure checkout page for completing payments using multiple payment methods including cards and online gateways.

imageurl.title: PayPal Screen
imageurl.description: Dedicated PayPal payment interface enabling fast and secure online transactions for customer orders.

imageurl.title: User Profile
imageurl.description: User account section to manage personal details, view order history, track purchases, and update account settings.

description: This product showcases a full-featured e-commerce store inspired by platforms like Amazon. It includes product browsing, detailed product pages, customer reviews, cart and checkout flow, address management, and secure payment integration. The system delivers a smooth online shopping experience with a modern UI and real-world e-commerce functionality.
